content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(61.0, -52.0) and (63.0, -52.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (61.0, -52.0) and stone furnace at position (63.0, -52.0) that are connected to copper ore inputs.

### Copper plate factory at position(65.0, -52.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (65.0, -52.0) that is currently not receiving any ingredients to smelt.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has space for the output before inserting items. The warning "furnace result is full" indicates that the furnace cannot accept more items until it has processed some of its current output.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
